name: AS_GSS_TMG_UT_returnUserGroupsForTaskFilters
description: Returns all IO Task Recipient groups that the user is a part of
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!groups: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnGroupsUserIsAMemberOf(
    parentGroup: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_GRP_TASK_RECIPIENTS,
    user: ri!username
  ),
  local!groups
)
